CircusOfPlates
Class PlateSky

java.lang.Object
  CircusOfPlates.PlateSky

public class PlateSky
extends java.lang.Object

The PlateSky class is designed for handling the falling state of plates and their motion during falling from bars until caught by the players or vanish The air factor is implemented here using static variables; The game speed can also be modified

Since:
JDK 1.6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mostafa Mahmod Mahmod Eweda
See Also:
Plate

Field Summary
private  int airShift
          The air shift of the sky with which the plates oscillates eight and left
private  org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Rectangle displayBounds
           
private  java.util.ArrayList<Plate> flying
          a list of the plates the sky has --> internally updated when updating the sky
private static PlateSky instance
          instance of the PlateSky class to represent the singleton pattern
private  int leastHeight
          The nearest bar the sky has received plates from
private  int repeatTimes
          The repeat times the plates should be shifted right or left before innverting the direction
private  int times
          counter to hold the number of times the plates shifted right or left till now
private static int updateStep
          The update step of the plates falling towards earth
 
Constructor Summary
private PlateSky()
          initializes the starting elements for future management

          hiding the constructor and providing getInstance() method is a way to represent the singleton of the sky class
